issues.description:
A possible integer overflow exists in the function `GetExistsChipList()`.
The addition or multiplication may result in a value higher than the maximum representable integer.
issues.title: Integer Overflow

issues.description:
Function SetAuth(address) retrieves the transaction origin (tx.origin) using the ORIGIN opcode. Use msg.sender instead.
See also: https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/develop/security-considerations.html#tx-origin
issues.title: Use of tx.origin

issues.description:
Function ClearAuth(address) retrieves the transaction origin (tx.origin) using the ORIGIN opcode. Use msg.sender instead.
See also: https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/develop/security-considerations.html#tx-origin
issues.title: Use of tx.origin

issues.description:
A possible integer overflow exists in the function `GetChipInfo(uint32)`.
The addition or multiplication may result in a value higher than the maximum representable integer.
issues.title: Integer Overflow
